/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades adorned with various advertisements and billboards, adding a vibrant splash of color to the otherwise monochrome palette of grays and blacks. Cars and buses traverse the street, their movement creating a dynamic tableau of urban life. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, providing a serene backdrop to the bustling activity below.
